org.tantalum.util
Class PoolingWeakImageHashCache

java.lang.Object
  org.tantalum.util.WeakHashCache
      org.tantalum.util.PoolingWeakHashCache
          org.tantalum.util.PoolingWeakImageHashCache

public final class PoolingWeakImageHashCache
extends PoolingWeakHashCache

Keep recent instances of images all of which are the same size in memory. The cache will automatically clear() if the image size changes. This means you can be guaranteed that if an images is returned, it is the correct size.

Author:
phou
